about.title: What is Crowdfunding.uz?
about.subtitle: In their quest to improve the quality of life, they forget that the frontier of workforce training requires us to analyze the workforce training system that meets the immediate needs. As well as the conviction of some opponents is a qualitatively new stage in the rethinking of foreign economic policies.
about.text1: In their quest to improve the quality of life, they forget that the frontier of workforce training requires us to analyze the workforce training system that meets the immediate needs. As well as the conviction of some opponents is a qualitatively new stage in the rethinking of foreign economic policies.
about.text2: Within the specification of modern standards, the shareholders of the largest companies are mixed with non-unique data to the point of complete unrecognizability, which increases their status of worthlessness. In general, of course, the current structure of the organization creates the prerequisites for standard approaches. Taking into account the current international situation, the implementation of the planned targets provides a wide range of (specialists) participation in the formation of forms of influence. The mission of the organization
